publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5035 Mr Ted Brocklebank: Motion of Condolence—That the Parliament sends its condolences to the family and friends of the crew of the Anstruther-based Meridian, three of whom are still lost at sea; commends the efforts of the rescue services of both the United Kingdom and Norway in trying to locate survivors of the tragedy in what were terrible conditions in the North Sea, and recognises that, while the search sadly failed to find any survivors, this international operation represented one the largest and most professional air-sea rescue missions carried out for many years. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Robin Harper*, Murdo Fraser*, Bruce Crawford*, Dave Petrie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Des McNulty*, Kate Maclean*, Michael McMahon*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Alex Neil*, Stewart Stevenson*

S2M-5035 Motion of Condolence (lodged on 30 October 2006) Margaret Mitchell*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr David Davidson*, Derek Brownlee*, Chris Ballance*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Murray Tosh*, Trish Godman*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-5035 Motion of Condolence (lodged on 30 October 2006) Jackie Baillie*, Mr John Swinney*, John Swinburne*, Dennis Canavan*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-5035 Mr Ted Brocklebank: Motion of Condolence—That the Parliament sends its condolences to the family and friends of the crew of the Anstruther-based Meridian, three of whom are still lost at sea; commends the efforts of the rescue services of both the United Kingdom and Norway in trying to locate survivors of the tragedy in what were terrible conditions in the North Sea, and recognises that, while the search sadly failed to find any survivors, this international operation represented one the largest and most professional air-sea rescue missions carried out for many years. Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Mr Jim Wallace, Karen Gillon, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Robin Harper, Murdo Fraser, Bruce Crawford, Dave Petrie, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Des McNulty, Kate Maclean, Michael McMahon, Mrs Nanette Milne, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Maureen Watt, Mr Mark Ruskell, Bill Aitken, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Alex Neil, Stewart Stevenson, Margaret Mitchell, Richard Lochhead, Mr David Davidson, Derek Brownlee, Chris Ballance, Rob Gibson, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Murray Tosh, Trish Godman, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Jackie Baillie, Mr John Swinney, John Swinburne, Dennis Canavan, Mr Brian Monteith, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-5035 Motion of Condolence (lodged on 30 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5035 Motion of Condolence (lodged on 30 October 2006) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-5035 Motion of Condolence (lodged on 30 October 2006) Helen Eadie*, Miss Annabel Goldie*
S2M-5035 Motion of Condolence (lodged on 30 October 2006) Susan Deacon*
S2M-5035 Motion of Condolence (lodged on 30 October 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-5035 Motion of Condolence (lodged on 30 October 2006) Cathy Peattie*
